title: Alex Jones told to pay $965m to Sandy Hook families
description: The conspiracy theorist is ordered to pay damages after branding the 2012 school shooting a hoax. Also: Nato countries to boost Ukraine's missile defence, and lab-grown brain cells play video game Pong.
itunes:subtitle: Twenty children and six adults were killed in the massacre
itunes:summary: The conspiracy theorist is ordered to pay damages after branding the 2012 school shooting a hoax. Also: Nato countries to boost Ukraine's missile defence, and lab-grown brain cells play video game Pong.
itunes:author: BBC World Service
